extends java.lang.Object

    The game named Lanterns : Harvest Festival This class is used to run the game

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String[] playersNames,
    int[] strategies,
    Rule rule,
    java.util.ArrayList<Disaster> disasters)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        constructor of the game
        Parameters:
        playersNames - the name of players
        strategies - the technique to play of each players there are 5 strategies such as Greedy, Unfriendly, Random, Base or Human
        rule - how to win the game there are 3 rules; lake tile stack is empty(basic rule) ,n lake tile on board and n honor to choose;
        disasters - unexpected situations in the game there are 3 disasters; tsunami, passing power boat and lightning strike
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - used when there are not between 2-4 players
